title: TilesGrid Component Demo
desc:
With 14 villages, Nusa Penida has dozen places that may attract tourist. Cherysa Tour select tourist destionation to fit your time and budget.
We devide our tour into:
West Nusa Penida Tour: Tree of Love and Kelingking Beach, Angel Billabong, Crystal Bay Beach.
East Nusa Penida Tour: Teletubbies Hills, Raja Lima and Tree House, Atuh Beach and Giri Putri Cave.
Nusa Lembongan Tour: Panorama Point, Dream Beach, Devil's Tears, Yellow Bridge, Mangrove Forest.

tilesGrid.name: Semabu Hills Hotel
tilesGrid.desc:
It can be argued that Bali is as close to heaven on earth as it gets and we at Semabu Hills have put in place the crowning glory of this picturesque getaway.

Just 30 minutes off the east coast of Bali on the tropical island of Nusa Penida, Semabu Hills is proud to host you and give you an experience to cherish.

tilesGrid.name: Bintang Bungalow Hotel
tilesGrid.desc:
Bintang Bungalow is located in Toyapakeh just about 800 meters from Crystal Bay. The hotel is a 15-minutes drive to Gamat Bay and 30-minutes to Angel's Billabong.

Features an outdoor pool. You can enjoy meals at the restaurant at the accommodation.

tilesGrid.name: Caspla Beach Hotel
tilesGrid.desc:
Caspla Beach Hotel, Restaurant & Bar is built seashore side on the easthern most tip of Bali, that is Nusa Penida Island.

Enjoy luxury hotels on east Bali and an unforgettable holiday in Caspla Beach Hotel, Bar & Restaurant unique, elegant, tropical style, ocean front bungalows. the hotel building full of wood, here you can enjoy free pool, eating at the beachside restaurant.

tilesGrid.name: Angel Billabong
tilesGrid.desc: a spectacular rock formation on Nusa Penida island's southwestern cliff edges. It's nearby Pasih Uug (Broken Beach), another popular site with unique limestone formations. The naturally formed rock lagoon offers a scenic seascape.

tilesGrid.name: Broken Beach
tilesGrid.desc: Broken Beach also popular as Pasih Uug is a scenic coastal formation on the southwestern edge of Nusa Penida island. The spot is marked by a hilly arch-like rock formation, which is the distinguishable landmark of the area. Set over the crashing waves of the open Indian Ocean.

tilesGrid.name: Kelingking Beach
tilesGrid.desc: Kelingking Beach is a hidden beach in the village of Bunga Mekar, on the southwestern coast of Nusa Penida island. You can enjoy one of the most breath-taking views over the hills and small strip of white sand from atop a hill of the same name.
